title: clapping hands: dark skin tone

adjectives: Expressive of sympathetic pleasure or joy on account of someone's success or good fortune
verbs: Clap one's hands or shout after performances to indicate approval
To praise or show approval, by clapping the hands.
To express approval (of something) by clapping the hands.
To shout approval; to express great approval.
To cause something to strike soundly.
To strike on the cheek with the open hand.
Hit with something flat, like a paddle or the open hand
nouns: The act of applauding; approbation and praise publicly expressed by the clapping of hands, stamping or tapping of the feet, acclamation, huzzas, or other means; marked commendation.
Act of applauding.
A demonstration of approval by clapping the hands together
A clap is the percussive sound made by striking together two flat surfaces, as in the body parts of humans or animals.
Praise or approval, expressed by clapping the hands.
Applause is primarily the expression of approval by the act of clapping, or striking the palms of the hands together, in order to create noise.
The act of expressing approval or admiration; commendation; laudation.
Praise is the act of making positive statements about a person, object or idea, either in public or privately.
That part of the fore limb below the forearm or wrist in primates (including humans).
The part of the fore limb below the forearm or wrist in a human, and the corresponding part in many other animals.
The zoological term for the distal portion of the forelimb of an animal (including the human hand)
Part of the fore limb.
The (prehensile) extremity of the superior limb
The manus is the zoological term for the distal portion of the fore limb of an animal.
A hand, as the part of the fore limb below the forearm in a man, or the corresponding part in other vertebrates.
A hand is a prehensile, multi-fingered extremity located at the end of an arm or forelimb of primates such as humans, chimpanzees, monkeys, and lemurs.
Praise
Praise; accolades.
An expression of approval and commendation
Expressing praise and approval, expressing approbation.
An expression of approval and commendation.

description: This version of the  Clapping Hands emoji has the  Dark Skin Tone applied, which is displayed as a Black Skin Tone on supported platform
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the clapping hands emoji with a dark skin tone radiates enthusiasm and appreciation, its design featuring dynamic, rounded shapes and bright highlights that convey energetic applause. The smooth gradients and realistic lighting give the hands a tangible, almost tactile quality, emphasizing the supportive and celebratory gesture. This emoji is a powerful way to express approval, congratulations, or strong encouragement in any digital conversation on Apple products.
